argumentText:
ARGUMENT
s t u

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ernggrp.h-r | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | ernggrp.d-r | |- D = ( ( EDRingR ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | ernggrplem.b-r | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 4 |  | ernggrplem.t-r | |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) |
| 5 |  | ernggrplem.e-r | |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) |
| 6 |  | ernggrplem.p-r | |- P = ( a e. E , b e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( a ` f ) o. ( b ` f ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | ernggrplem.o-r | |- O = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) |
| 8 |  | ernggrplem.i-r | |- I = ( a e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> `' ( a ` f ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` D ) = ( Base ` D ) |
| 10 | 1, 4, 5, 2, 9 | #P_erngbase-rN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( Base ` D ) = E ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> E = ( Base ` D ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` D ) = ( +g ` D ) |
| 13 | 1, 4, 5, 2, 12 | #P_erngfplus-rN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( +g ` D ) = ( a e. E , b e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( a ` f ) o. ( b ` f ) ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13, 6 | #P_syl6reqr | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> P = ( +g ` D ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 4, 5, 6 | #P_tendoplcl | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ s e. E /\ t e. E ) -> ( s P t ) e. E ) |
| 16 | 1, 4, 5, 6 | #P_tendoplass | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( s e. E /\ t e. E /\ u e. E ) ) -> ( ( s P t ) P u ) = ( s P ( t P u ) ) ) |
| 17 | 3, 1, 4, 5, 7 | #P_tendo0cl | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> O e. E ) |
| 18 | 3, 1, 4, 5, 7, 6 | #P_tendo0pl | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ s e. E ) -> ( O P s ) = s ) |
| 19 | 1, 4, 5, 8 | #P_tendoicl | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ s e. E ) -> ( I ` s ) e. E ) |
| 20 | 1, 4, 5, 8, 3, 6, 7 | #P_tendoipl | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ s e. E ) -> ( ( I ` s ) P s ) = O ) |
| 21 | 11, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20 | #P_isgrpd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> D e. Grp ) |
